title: League of Legends.exe Deletes Itself
body:
After the anti-cheat update, they dished out an updated client in the 'known issues' thread.  Problem is that when I unzip the files, the .exe deletes itself after about 10 seconds.  At one point I managed to force it to not do so, but it deleted itself from the /deploy folder eventually, and now I can't get it to stick again.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Your computer is telling you to quit this weeb game

Thanks for reporting this. Sounds to me like anti-virus software is removing the file. In any case, now that 8.13 is live, the files we provided will no longer work. We've removed them from the known issues thread. An updated version of the anti-cheat that contains all of our fixes should be deployed via the client today.
